data.name: Neko Candy Shop 18+ DLC
data.detailed_description: The DLC contains adult content, that unlocks the entire content of the base game
data.about_the_game: The DLC contains adult content, that unlocks the entire content of the base game
data.short_description: The DLC contains adult content, that unlocks the entire content of the base game
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Greek, Danish, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 (or equivalent) 64 bit
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: with 1 GB VRAM compatible with DirectX
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
